{"id":376583438,"lang":"c","time":"1Â year, 8Â months","timestamp":1596651801,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/376583438/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"String to Integer (atoi)","memory":"5.1 MB","code":"\n\nint myAtoi(char * str){\n    int n = strlen(str); \n    int start_idx = 0; \n    while((*(str + start_idx)) == ' ') {\n        ++start_idx; \n    }\n    \n    bool isNeg = false; \n    if ((*(str + start_idx)) == '-') {\n        isNeg = true; \n        ++start_idx; \n    }\n    \n    else if ((*(str + start_idx)) == '+') {\n        ++start_idx; \n    }\n    \n    int ans = 0; \n    int lastdig = INT_MAX % 10; \n    while(isdigit((*(str + start_idx)))) {\n        if (ans > INT_MAX / 10 || (ans == INT_MAX / 10 && ((*(str + start_idx) - '0') > lastdig))) {\n            if (isNeg) {\n                return INT_MIN; \n            } else {\n                return INT_MAX; \n            }\n        }\n        \n        ans = ans * 10 + ((*(str + start_idx)) - '0'); \n        ++start_idx; \n    }\n    return (isNeg?-1:1) * ans; \n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"string-to-integer-atoi"}
